name: Bugbear
description: A hulking goblinoid creature with long arms and shaggy fur, known for its brutish appearance.
memorable: Known for ambushing prey from the shadows and using brutal grappling tactics.
goals: Typically raids and pillages weaker settlements, often forming small bands.
relations: Related to other goblinoids and often found with smaller goblin allies.
strengths: Excels in melee combat and stealth, able to ambush surprised foes effectively.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma, limiting social interactions.
attacks: Uses melee attacks like Strangle and Maul, and can throw Javelins.
most_powerful_ability: Surprise Attack inflicts extra damage when striking a surprised target.
equipment: Typically armed with clubs, axes, or spiked weapons.
skills: Proficient in stealth and athletics, enhancing its ambush tactics.
additional_information: Known for their cruel nature and violent behavior.
Brute ability adds extra damage on melee attacks.
Can grapple targets, restricting their breathing.
Master of stealth, able to hide effectively.
Possesses a significant tactical advantage when ambushing.
test_queries: shaggy brute that attacks from shadows
violent creature armed with spiked weapons
medium humanoid known for surprise attacks
